channel.title: CVE Feed for NXLog -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NXLog -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-32791|2024-09-06T14:09:28.930Z -- nxlog -- nxlog%20manager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in NXLog Manager 5.6.5633 version. This vulnerability allows an attacker to manipulate and delete user accounts within the platform by sending a specifically crafted query to the server. The vulnerability is based on the lack of proper validation of the origin of incoming requests.
